name: The 4th Int'l Conference on Medicinal Chemistry and Drug Discovery
content: The 4th Int'l Conference on Medicinal Chemistry and Drug Discovery (MCDD 2024) will be held during July 19-21, 2024 in Xi'an, China. The conference will cover issues on Medicinal Chemistry, Drug Discovery, etc. It dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods in related fields.
